title: Throw Back Thursday with Rakim Interview and More
itunes:title: Throw Back Thursday with Rakim Interview and More
description:
Today on the show we had Rakim visit the Breakfast Club where he discussed Hip-Hop history, Dr. Dre sessions and spoke about Eric B., as well as his book "Sweat the Technique" . Yee also gave listeners Love and Family advice today on #AskYee and Charlamagne gave Donkey of The Day to a Long Island elementary school teacher who assigned students an inappropriate and offensive homework assignment about slavery . 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
